name: 陳岡伯
objective:
本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調人文專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
This course aims to provide pre-service cultural business students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. 

The course will be arranged thematically to approach important topics in humanities including culture, art, music, philosophy, literature, history, and popular culture (including films and TV series). The instructor will lecture on one selected article (distributed to students a week in advance) and conduct in-class discussion each week.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to the course 

Teaching session 1: Culture
Week 2: Entertainment industry
Week 3: The psychology of festival

Teaching session 2: technology and art
Week 4: 3D printing
Week 5: "Aura"

Teaching session 3: Fashion
Week 6: Fashion bloggers
Week 7: Fashion and ethics

Teaching session 4: Cultural heritages
Week 8: Public museums

Week 9: Mid-term exam

Week 10: The Faroe Islands 
Week 11: Music

Teaching session 5: Film industry and political correctness
Week 12: Disney magic
Week 13-15: Political correctness in film industry

Week 16-17: Group presentations

Week 18: Final reflection
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation: 20%
Mid-term exam: 30%
Oral presentation: 30%
Joint exam: 20%
materials: Articles from the designated textbook (北科之英 ESP）will be distributed by the instructor. Additional materials will be provided as well.
